title: Sweden Private Debt to GDP
description: Private Debt to GDP in Sweden increased to 309.40 percent in 2021 from 304.50 percent in 2020. Private Debt to GDP in Sweden averaged 242.85 percent from 1995 until 2021, reaching an all time high of 309.40 percent in 2021 and a record low of 182.10 percent in 1996. Private sector debt to GDP measures the indebtedness of both sectors, non-financial corporations and households and non-profit institutions serving households, as a percentage of GDP.
author: OECD
